functionSummary.name: CyU3PGpifLoad
functionSummary.description: Function to program the user defined state machine into the GPIF registers.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PGpifRegisterCallback
functionSummary.description: This function registers an event callback for the GPIF driver.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PGpifWaveformLoad
functionSummary.description: Initialize the GPIF state machine table.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PGpifConfigure
functionSummary.description: Initialize the GPIF configuration registers.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PGpifRegisterConfig
functionSummary.description: Initialize the GPIF configuration registers.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PGpifInitTransFunctions
functionSummary.description: Initialize the GPIF transition function registers.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PGpifDisable
functionSummary.description: Disables the GPIF state machine and hardware.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PGpifSMStart
functionSummary.description: Start the waveform state machine from the specified state.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PGpifSMSwitch
functionSummary.description: This function is used to start GPIF state machine execution from a desired state.
functionSummary.arguments: (uint16_t fromState, uint16_t toState, uint16_t endState, uint8_t initialAlpha, uint32_t switchTimeout)

functionSummary.name: CyU3PGpifInitCtrlCounter
functionSummary.description: Function to configure the GPIF control counter.
functionSummary.arguments: (uint16_t initValue, uint16_t limit, CyBool_t reload, CyBool_t upCount, uint8_t outputBit)

functionSummary.name: CyU3PGpifInitAddrCounter
functionSummary.description: Function to configure the GPIF address counter.
functionSummary.arguments: (uint32_t initValue, uint32_t limit, CyBool_t reload, CyBool_t upCount, uint8_t increment)

functionSummary.name: CyU3PGpifInitDataCounter
functionSummary.description: Function to configure the GPIF data counter.
functionSummary.arguments: (uint32_t initValue, uint32_t limit, CyBool_t reload, CyBool_t upCount, uint8_t increment)

functionSummary.name: CyU3PGpifInitComparator
functionSummary.description: This function configures one of the comparators in the GPIF hardware.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PGpifSMControl
functionSummary.description: Function to pause/resume the GPIF state machine.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PGpifControlSWInput
functionSummary.description: Function to set/clear the software controlled state machine input.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PGpifSocketConfigure
functionSummary.description: Function to select an active socket on the P-port and to configure it.
functionSummary.arguments: (uint8_t threadIndex, CyU3PDmaSocketId_t socketNum, uint16_t watermark, CyBool_t flagOnData, uint8_t burst)

functionSummary.name: CyU3PGpifReadDataWords
functionSummary.description: Read a specified number of data words from the GPIF interface.
functionSummary.arguments: (uint32_t threadIndex, CyBool_t selectThread, uint32_t numWords, uint32_t *buffer_p, uint32_t waitOption)

functionSummary.name: CyU3PGpifWriteDataWords
functionSummary.description: Write a specified number of data words to the GPIF interface.
functionSummary.arguments: (uint32_t threadIndex, CyBool_t selectThread, uint32_t numWords, uint32_t *buffer_p, uint32_t waitOption)

functionSummary.name: CyU3PGpifOutputConfigure
functionSummary.description: Configure the functionality of a GPIF output pin.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PGpifGetSMState
functionSummary.description: Get the current state of the GPIF state machine.
